name: Rondeau Provincial Park
review: Absolutely love this place! It's so beautiful! I went near the end of October and all the fall colours were great. Love the dog beach, it's so big! So many animals around as well, I saw deer more than a handful of times

name: Rondeau Provincial Park
review: Awesome fishing, clean campgrounds, decent beach, do your research on the site you book as there are a lot that are full sun all day with few trees for hanging hammocks or clothes lines. Washroom and shower facilities are clean and mostly bug free.

review: Well kept park with beautiful trails. Visitor centre offers guided hikes that my kids love

name: Rondeau Provincial Park
review: We went in the month of June and had no problem getting a site while other provincial parks were booked up.   The sites aren‚Äôt as private as other parks, however we had very few sites booked around us.  Still a great experience.

name: Rondeau Provincial Park
review: Went camping for a weekend in July and have absolutely no complaints. Beautiful campground with plenty to do including a beach, dog beach, ice cream shop and community center. There is also a little pub called Rondeau Joe's just outside ...

name: Rondeau Provincial Park
review: Beautiful beach. Lovely for little ones and those of us who like to sit in shallow water. Beach was clean. Bathrooms and showers were clean. Camp site was spacious. Had a great time! Would definitely go back.

name: Rondeau Provincial Park

name: Rondeau Provincial Park
review: Great park. I wish our governing authority saw it a priority to rebuild the peer in the bay and the lookout tower on the trail. Otherwise this is an awesome park. Lake on one side and the bay on the other. Awesome beach and perfect for all kinds of water activities.

name: Rondeau Provincial Park

name: Rondeau Provincial Park

name: Rondeau Provincial Park
review: I love Rondeau. It's only an hour from Windsor and they have a nice beach...except the dog beach, which is all rocks and not great for walking on unless you have shoes on.
